description: This file contains utility functions for dependency injection and user authentication in a FastAPI application, specifically functions to provide database sessions and current user retrieval based on JWT tokens.

methods.name: get_db()
methods.description: Provides a SQLAlchemy database session for dependency injection.

methods.name: User get_current_user( authorization: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="Authorization"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user based on Bearer token in the Authorization header.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.signature: ( authorization: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="Authorization"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
